upgradeDesc: to unlock all features you need to upgrade to premium or watch an ad

tutorialDesc:
To access locked sections of the software, you need to either upgrade your account or watch an advertisement. To view the advertisement, your VPN must be active and your IP address should not be located in Iran.
Within the software, the following features are available:
1.	You can write any text you want and personalize it using available fonts, colors, and backgrounds. After making changes, click on the "Copy" option, and you can export it separately for Telegram and Instagram.
2.	You can add your own preferred fonts to the software.
3.	You can copy any of the available stickers and use them in Telegram.
4.	You can choose one of the available backgrounds for stories, use it directly on Instagram, or add it within the software and make changes here.
FAQ:
We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting it through our compliance with this policy. This policy describes:
•	The types of information we may collect or that you may provide when you download, install, access, or use Our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information.
•	This policy applies only to information we collect in the App and in email, text, and other electronic communications sent through or in connection with the App.
Information We Collect and How We Collect It
Information Collected for Advertisements
We may display advertisements from Google AdMob, an advertising service provided by Google LLC. AdMob may collect and use personal data for personalized advertising. AdMob may collect information about your device, such as the device's advertising identifier, IP address, and other identifiers, to personalize the advertisements you see. For more information about how Google collects and uses your data, please see Google's Privacy Policy
Purchase Transactions
If you make a purchase within the App, we want to assure you that we do not have access to your bank information, credit card details, or any other sensitive financial information. All payment transactions are processed through a secure third-party payment gateway, and we do not store or have access to your payment information.
Permissions
Our App requests access to the internet to display advertisements from AdMob and to process in-app purchases. These permissions are necessary for the proper functioning of the ads and purchase transactions within the App. We do not collect any personal information through this process, and we do not request access to any other sensitive information on your device.
Third-Party Access
We allow Google AdMob to access the necessary data to provide personalized advertisements within the App. We do not allow any other third parties to access your data.
Children's Privacy
Our App is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are under 13, do not use or provide any information on this App.
Changes to Our Privacy Policy
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make material changes to how we treat our users' personal information, we will post the new privacy policy on this page. Your continued use of the App after such modifications will constitute your acknowledgment of the modified policy and your agreement to abide and be bound by the modified policy.
Contact Information
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us
By using the App, you agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to the terms and conditions of this Privacy Policy, please do not use the App.
